Martin Blank.Action: Kills a target with a sniper rifle without hesitation.
Sits quietly on the fringes of a social group, not engaging deeply.

Politely declines an offer from the Doorman/Grocer to join a professional 'club' aimed at consolidating efforts and making more money while working less.

Maintains intense concentration and fine motor control throughout a delicate technical operation.
